text:
@realDonaldTrump You were DEAD WRONG all the way.
You thought #coronavirus would blow over, and you even mocked people who took it seriously.

      “This is their latest hoax”

You are simply not man enough to admit your mistakes.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
